title.rendered: RoboMarkets Renews Its Partnership with Cyprus’s AutoLife Racing Team

content.rendered:
RoboMarkets, a well-known European brokerage firm, is pleased to share the news of renewing its platinum partnership with AutoLife Racing Team, the Cyprus-based racing team. This partnership emphasizes RoboMarkets’ presence at major international racing events.

In 2023 and 2025, RoboMarkets will be prominently featured at the Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge and the Dakar Rally, respectively.

AutoLife Racing Team, notable for its participation in renowned races such as the Dakar Rally and the Greece Offroad, includes a skilled crew led by pilot Roman Starikovich, navigator Bert Heskes, and team manager Sijbrand Booij.

RoboMarkets and AutoLife Racing Together Since 2019

Since initiating their partnership in 2019, AutoLife has demonstrated strong performance and spirit, recently achieving second place in the T1 class at the Abu Dhabi Baja Challenge.

For the past five years, RoboMarkets has supported AutoLife Racing Team’s ambitions and goals, ensuring the team remains competitive in motorsport events.

RoboMarkets, licensed under CySEC (No. 191/13), offers trading access to various financial markets for both retail and professional traders under favorable trading conditions.

RoboMarkets’ Community Engagement in Cyprus
RoboMarkets is also active in Cyprus’s local community, promoting competitive events such as last year’s sponsorship of the 56th European Championship Sporting. This event attracted elite shooters from Europe, focusing on competition and team spirit.

Moreover, the brokerage has continued its association with BMW M Motorsport as a Premium Partner. Renowned racer René Rast drove the BMW M4 GT3, featuring RoboMarkets’ design, in his races.

Additionally, RoboMarkets maintains its sponsorship with Eintracht Frankfurt, a prominent football club in Germany’s Bundesliga. This partnership includes RoboMarkets’ logo presence at the club’s stadium, on advertising boards, and in TV ads during matches, lasting until the end of the 2023/2024 season.
